name: Hygge (2019)
description:
Created in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2019 - theme: What home means to you.

A first-person vignette in a warm and cosy home where you may rest, sit by a fire, and call for a bird to delivery messages of encouragement.

Inspired by the Danish concept of hygge (pronounced hue-guh), a word for a quality of coziness and comfortable conviviality with feelings of wellness and contentment.

Here is a nice video about hygge as seen in various video-games (Satchell Drakes).
